properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands; East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island; Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 9 at 2:45PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
...Gusty northeast to east winds with building wind waves across
the coastal waters including Catalina Island through Monday
morning...

A cold upper level low pressure system will bring increasing
moisutre and instability across the coastal waters this afternoon
into evening. This will result in scattered showers with a slight
chance of thunderstorms across the inner waters, as well as the
southern portion of the outer waters. Any thunderstorms that
develop will have the potential to bring brief heavy downpours,
small hail, and gusty downdraft winds.

In addition to the thunderstorm threat, northeast winds will be
increasing across the inner waters, with gusts between 20 and
30 knots at times through Monday morning. This will bring building
northeast wind waves of 2 to 4 feet, which could impact some
of the northeast facing harbors, including Avalon.

NWSheadline: Slight chance of thunderstorms across coastal waters through tonight
